thread.title: Deanna Burke
thread.title_full: Quality Logo Products, Inc. reviewed by Deanna Burke

author: Deanna Burke
title: Deanna Burke
text: Anthony was a terrific! The product is absolutely fantastic, and we are completely satisfied with the service we received. Anthony made sure with constant contact that all of our needs were met and exceeded. I can’t believe how fast the order was done and shipped to us. I’m going to share this company with my co-workers so we are sure to use them in the future!
